name: cloud-cli-login-statuses
title: Cloud CLI Login Statuses
description: Check if you are logged in AWS, Google Cloud and Azure CLIs
author: adam_vyborny

commands.name: check-cloud-cli-login-statuses
commands.title: Check Cloud CLI Login Statuses
commands.subtitle: Cloud CLI Login Statuses
commands.description: Check if you are logged in AWS, Google Cloud and Azure CLIs

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
